member.name: T:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Cache
member.summary: This objects contains info about a request coming from browser cache.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Cache.BeforeRequest
member.summary: beforeRequest [object, optional] State of a cache entry before the request. Leave out this field if the information is not available.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Cache.AfterRequest
member.summary: afterRequest [object, optional] State of a cache entry after the request. Leave out this field if the information is not available.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Cache.Comment
member.summary: comment [string, optional] (new in 1.2) A comment provided by the user or the application.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.CacheItem.Expires
member.summary: expires [string, optional] Expiration time of the cache entry.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.CacheItem.LastAccess
member.summary: lastAccess [string] The last time the cache entry was opened.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.CacheItem.ETag
member.summary: eTag [string] Etag

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.CacheItem.HitCount
member.summary: hitCount [number] The number of times the cache entry has been opened.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.CacheItem.Comment
member.summary: comment [string, optional] (new in 1.2) - A comment provided by the user or the application.

member.name: T:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Content
member.summary: This object describes details about response content (embedded in response object).

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Content.Size
member.summary: size [number] Length of the returned content in bytes. Should be equal to response.bodySize if there is no compression and bigger when the content has been compressed.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Content.Compression
member.summary: compression [number, optional] Number of bytes saved. Leave out this field if the information is not available.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Content.MimeType
member.summary: mimeType [string] MIME type of the response text (value of the Content-Type response header). The charset attribute of the MIME type is included (if available).

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Content.Text
member.summary: text [string, optional] Response body sent from the server or loaded from the browser cache. This field is populated with textual content only. The text field is either HTTP decoded text or a encoded (e.g. "base64") representation of the response body. Leave out this field if the information is not available.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Content.Comment
member.summary: comment [string, optional] (new in 1.2) A comment provided by the user or the application.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Cookie.Name
member.summary: name [string] The name of the cookie.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Cookie.Value
member.summary: value [string] The cookie value.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Cookie.Path
member.summary: path [string, optional] The path pertaining to the cookie.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Cookie.Domain
member.summary: domain [string, optional] The host of the cookie.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Cookie.Expires
member.summary: expires [string, optional] Cookie expiration time. (ISO 8601 - YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD, e.g. 2009-07-24T19:20:30.123+02:00).

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Cookie.HttpOnly
member.summary: httpOnly [boolean, optional] Set to true if the cookie is HTTP only, false otherwise.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Cookie.Secure
member.summary: secure [boolean, optional] (new in 1.2) True if the cookie was transmitted over ssl, false otherwise.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Cookie.Comment
member.summary: comment [string, optional] (new in 1.2) A comment provided by the user or the application.

member.name: T:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Entry
member.summary: This object represents an array with all exported HTTP requests. Sorting entries by startedDateTime (starting from the oldest) is preferred way how to export data since it can make importing faster. However the reader application should always make sure the array is sorted (if required for the import).

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Entry.PageRef
member.summary: pageref [string, unique, optional] Reference to the parent page. Leave out this field if the application does not support grouping by pages.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Entry.StartedDateTime
member.summary: startedDateTime [string] Date and time stamp of the request start (ISO 8601 - YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD).

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Entry.Time
member.summary: time [number] Total elapsed time of the request in milliseconds. This is the sum of all timings available in the timings object (i.e. not including -1 values)

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Entry.Request
member.summary: request [object] Detailed info about the request.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Entry.Response
member.summary: response [object] Detailed info about the response.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Entry.Cache
member.summary: cache [object] Info about cache usage.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Entry.Timings
member.summary: timings [object] Detailed timing info about request/response round trip.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Entry.ServerIpAddress
member.summary: serverIPAddress [string, optional] (new in 1.2) IP address of the server that was connected (result of DNS resolution).

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Entry.Connection
member.summary: connection [string, optional] (new in 1.2) Unique ID of the parent TCP/IP connection, can be the client port number. Note that a port number doesn't have to be unique identifier in cases where the port is shared for more connections. If the port isn't available for the application, any other unique connection ID can be used instead (e.g. connection index). Leave out this field if the application doesn't support this info.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Entry.Comment
member.summary: comment [string, optional] (new in 1.2) A comment provided by the user or the application.

member.name: T:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.HTTPArchive
member.summary:
A POCO implementation of the HTTP Archive specification v 1.2 http://www.softwareishard.com/blog/har-12-spec/
NOTE: property names are intentionally camel-cased to provide spec compliant round trip JSON serialization.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.HTTPArchive.Log
member.summary: This object represents the root of exported data.

member.name: T:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Log
member.summary: This object represents the root of exported data.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Log.Version
member.summary: version [string] Version number of the format. If empty, string "1.1" is assumed by default.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Log.Creator
member.summary: creator [object] Name and version info of the log creator application

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Log.Browser
member.summary: browser [object, optional] Name and version info of used browser.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Log.Pages
member.summary: pages [array, optional] List of all exported (tracked) pages. Leave out this field if the application does not support grouping by pages.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Log.Entries
member.summary: entries [array] List of all exported (tracked) requests.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Log.Comment
member.summary: comment [string, optional] (new in 1.2) A comment provided by the user or the application.

member.name: T:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Page
member.summary: An exported page

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Page.StartedDateTime
member.summary: startedDateTime [string] Date and time stamp for the beginning of the page load (ISO 8601 - YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD, e.g. 2009-07-24T19:20:30.45+01:00).

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Page.Id
member.summary: id [string] Unique identifier of a page within the . Entries use it to refer the parent page.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Page.Title
member.summary: title [string] Page title.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Page.PageTimings
member.summary: pageTimings[object] Detailed timing info about page load.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Page.Comment
member.summary: comment [string, optional] (new in 1.2) A comment provided by the user or the application.

member.name: T:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.PageTimings
member.summary: This object describes timings for various events (states) fired during the page load. All times are specified in milliseconds. If a time info is not available appropriate field is set to -1.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.PageTimings.OnContentLoad
member.summary: onContentLoad [number, optional] Content of the page loaded. Number of milliseconds since page load started (page.startedDateTime). Use -1 if the timing does not apply to the current request.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.PageTimings.OnLoad
member.summary: onLoad [number,optional] Page is loaded (onLoad event fired). Number of milliseconds since page load started (page.startedDateTime). Use -1 if the timing does not apply to the current request.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.PageTimings.Comment
member.summary: comment [string, optional] (new in 1.2) A comment provided by the user or the application.

member.name: T:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.PostData
member.summary: This object describes posted data, if any (embedded in request object).

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.PostData.MimeType
member.summary: mimeType [string] Mime type of posted data.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.PostData.Params
member.summary: params [array] List of posted parameters (in case of URL encoded parameters).

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.PostData.Text
member.summary: text [string] Plain text posted data

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.PostData.Comment
member.summary: comment [string, optional] (new in 1.2) A comment provided by the user or the application.

member.name: T:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Request
member.summary: This object contains detailed info about performed request.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Request.Method
member.summary: method [string] Request method (GET, POST, ...).

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Request.Url
member.summary: url [string] Absolute URL of the request (fragments are not included).

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Request.HttpVersion
member.summary: httpVersion [string] Request HTTP Version.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Request.Cookies
member.summary: cookies [array] List of cookie objects.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Request.Headers
member.summary: headers [array] List of header objects.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Request.QueryString
member.summary: queryString [array] List of query parameter objects.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Request.PostData
member.summary: postData [object, optional] Posted data info.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Request.HeadersSize
member.summary: headersSize [number] Total number of bytes from the start of the HTTP request message until (and including) the double CRLF before the body. Set to -1 if the info is not available.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Request.BodySize
member.summary: bodySize [number] Size of the request body (POST data payload) in bytes. Set to -1 if the info is not available.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Request.Comment
member.summary: comment [string, optional] (new in 1.2) A comment provided by the user or the application.

member.name: T:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Response
member.summary: This object contains detailed info about the response.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Response.Status
member.summary: status [number] Response status.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Response.StatusText
member.summary: statusText [string] Response status description.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Response.HttpVersion
member.summary: httpVersion [string] Response HTTP Version.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Response.Cookies
member.summary: cookies [array] List of cookie objects.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Response.Headers
member.summary: headers [array] List of header objects.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Response.Content
member.summary: content [object] Details about the response body.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Response.RedirectUrl
member.summary: redirectURL [string] Redirection target URL from the Location response header.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Response.HeadersSize
member.summary:
headersSize [number] Total number of bytes from the start of the HTTP response message until (and including) the double CRLF before the body. Set to -1 if the info is not available.
The size of received response-headers is computed only from headers that are really received from the server. Additional headers appended by the browser are not included in this number, but they appear in the list of header objects.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Response.BodySize
member.summary: bodySize [number] Size of the received response body in bytes. Set to zero in case of responses coming from the cache (304). Set to -1 if the info is not available.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Response.Comment
member.summary: comment [string, optional] (new in 1.2) A comment provided by the user or the application.

member.name: T:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Timings
member.summary: This object describes various phases within request-response round trip. All times are specified in milliseconds.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Timings.Blocked
member.summary: blocked [number, optional] Time spent in a queue waiting for a network connection. Use -1 if the timing does not apply to the current request.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Timings.Dns
member.summary: dns [number, optional] DNS resolution time. The time required to resolve a host name. Use -1 if the timing does not apply to the current request.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Timings.Connect
member.summary: connect [number, optional] Time required to create TCP connection. Use -1 if the timing does not apply to the current request.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Timings.Send
member.summary: send [number] Time required to send HTTP request to the server.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Timings.Wait
member.summary: wait [number] Waiting for a response from the server.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Timings.Receive
member.summary: receive [number] Time required to read entire response from the server (or cache).

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Timings.Ssl
member.summary: ssl [number, optional] (new in 1.2) Time required for SSL/TLS negotiation. If this field is defined then the time is also included in the connect field (to ensure backward compatibility with HAR 1.1). Use -1 if the timing does not apply to the current request.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.Timings.Comment
member.summary: comment [string, optional] (new in 1.2) A comment provided by the user or the application.

member.name: T:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.VersionInfo
member.summary: Name and version info of used browser.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.VersionInfo.Name
member.summary: name [string] Name of the browser used to export the log.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.VersionInfo.Version
member.summary: version [string] Version of the browser used to export the log.

member.name: P:Salient.Portable.HttpArchiveFormat.VersionInfo.Comment
member.summary: comment [string, optional] (new in 1.2) A comment provided by the user or the application.
